org.deeplearning4j.rl4j.experience

Class ReplayMemoryExperienceHandler<A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.rl4j.experience.ReplayMemoryExperienceHandler<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - Action type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExperienceHandler<A,Transition<A>>

    public class ReplayMemoryExperienceHandler<A>
extends Object
implements ExperienceHandler<A,Transition<A>>
    A experience handler that stores the experience in a replay memory. See https://arxiv.org/abs/1312.5602 The experience container is a Transition that stores the tuple observation-action-reward-nextObservation, as well as whether or the not the episode ended after the Transition

        public List<Transition<A>> generateTrainingBatch()
        Description copied from interface: ExperienceHandler

        Returns:
